definition: to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: This year, the thick ice cap barely penetrates the bull's-eye of the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 今年，厚冰盖才刚刚穿过北极圈中心。

sentences.english: Denmark's territory includes the Faeroe Islands and Greenland in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦领土包括北极圈内的法罗群岛和格陵兰岛。

sentences.english: Work of the separate motorized rifle brigade dislocated in the Arctic Circle is far from being simple.
sentences.chinese: 在北极圈脱臼的独立机动步枪旅的工作是很不简单的。

sentences.english: As it situates near the Arctic Circle, there happens polar day and night.
sentences.chinese: 由于它靠近北极圈，这里有极昼和极夜。

sentences.english: The majestic Rocky Mountains stretch all the way from Mexico to the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 巍巍的落基山脉南起墨西哥一直向北延伸到北极圈。

sentences.english: between the Arctic Circle and the Tropic of Cancer.
sentences.chinese: 位于北极圈和北回归线之间。

sentences.english: Global warming is melting the Arctic ice-cap.
sentences.chinese: 北极圈冰层因著全球暖化正在融化中。

sentences.english: A panorama of Upernavik, Greenland, a small town in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰的乌佩纳维克，一个北极圈内的小镇的全景。

sentences.english: Rocky Mountains stretch all the way from Mexico to the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 巍巍的落基山脉南起墨西哥一直向北延伸到北极圈。

sentences.english: It is calving season in the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 这是北极圈的裂冰季节。

sentences.english: The Arctic Circle region of northern Sweden is the home of the Saami, or Lapp people.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典北部北极圈地区是萨米人或拉普人的家园。

sentences.english: Its high thermal insulation is a result from eiders adaptation to the bitterly cold ocean around the Polar Circle.
sentences.chinese: 其高保温特质缘自凫鸟对北极圈严寒气候的适应能力。

sentences.english: I live inside the Arctic Circle and we lose the sun altogether for two months in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 我居住在北极圈内，这儿的冬季有整整两个月是黑夜。

definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole

pinyin: Jia1 la1 pa4 ge1 si1 Qun2 dao3

definition: the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
